intro.p: Show all your calculations, including anything you plug into a calculator. Answers should be given in complete sentences and in the context of the situation.

One of the things that students who want to go to Medical School or Law School have to do is take a standardized test. The MCAT is required for admission to Medical school, the LSAT is required for admission to law school. These tests are called “standardized” because they are given in the same manner to all test takers and are graded in the same manner. Additionally, the scores designed to be normally distributed.
